reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, comfortable, and soft, with positive feedback about its material thickness. The fit receives mixed reviews - while some find it cute, others say it's super cropped. The quality, size, and color accuracy are also mixed aspects, with some praising the quality while others find it terrible, some saying it runs large, and several noting the color doesn't match the product description.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute, great material and fit
items.body: Super warm (considering the back is open) and cute; perfect fit. The material is thick enough where you dont have to wear a bra but I still wear tape just to feel safe. Medium, 5'5" 140lbs Read more
items.author: Kayalynn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Student in the front, sexy in the back
items.body: I wasn't sure how I would feel about this with the extremely open back. I. Am. Obsessed. My boyfriend took one look at this sweater and is insisting I buy it in every color. It's comfortable, and even though it's cropped, the front of this sweater is not nearly as revealing as I anticipated, which is perfect considering the open back. The front of this sweater gives cozy, cute, and a little bit nerdy/girl next door while the back of this sweater is surprisingly sexy. Pairing this with some high-waisted leggings or jeans and some cute boots is an easy and effortless outfit that looks like it was specifically curated. Read more
items.author: Kenna Marin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars SIZE UP!! (Maybe even size up by 2)
items.body: 4 stars due to sizing . Other than the sizing , this shirt is good quality in material thickness & color , soft and as expected . I love crop tops but I always order a size large for the longer crop top effect (other shirts Iâ€™m a size medium in) , this one I am going to be ordering a size xl to compare to the large to see if I like it better . The size large comes above the belly button still , even with pulling the front down some . Read more
items.author: Lexi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So pretty!!!! I love this top! *updated*
items.body: I got this top for Valentineâ€™s Day. I love it and my husband loves it. Itâ€™s shorter at the waist than expected on me. I donâ€™t know why. Looks like a crop top but I like it! I am 5â€™3 170lbs and I got a size medium. I would highly recommend! â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸ *updated* I updated my review with new pictures at the end after I lost an additional 10lbs. Looks great still love it! ðŸ˜ Read more

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not cotton but acrylic
items.body: Super cute, love the fit. However, the description says itâ€™s 85% cotton 15% polyester, while the tag says 100% acrylic. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect night out shirt
items.body: Very warm, super cute. I love that you can tie it! I pair mine with a floral skirt Read more

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: C-red, Khaki-1, 31-green, 31-black, 31-orange, 31-white. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
